The '''Passport''' is an item in {{Peak game}} which allows players to customize the appearance of their [[Scout]]s. The available customization options include the skin color, hair, eyes, mouth, fit (clothing), hats, and sashes.

The Passport is only accessible in the [[Airport]] and cannot be dropped.

Many cosmetics must be unlocked through the completion of a related [[Badge]] before they can be used. Sashes are unlocked through completing [[Ascents]].

== Trivia ==
* The Passport states your nationality as "Crabland", which is a reference to the [[Developers|developers]] of the game, ''AggroCrab'' & ''Landfall'', or ''Landcrab''.
* The Aggro Eyes & Mouth earned from the {{badge|Gourmand}} is a reference to ''AggroCrab'''s mascot.
* The Balloon Shorts & Skirt earned from the {{badge|Balloon}} is a reference to Russell, a character from the 2009 Pixar movie ''[[wikipedia:Up_(2009_film)|Up]]''.
* The Courier Hat earned from the {{badge|Speed Climber}} is a reference to ''Landfall'''s game ''HASTE''.
* The Matrix Glasses earned from the {{badge|Astronomy}} is a reference to the 1999 action movie ''[[wikipedia:The Matrix|The Matrix]]''.
* The Ice Blue & Ice Pink clothing earned from the {{Badge|Bundled Up}} is a reference to Popo & Nana, characters from the 1985 video game ''[[Wikipedia:Ice Climber|Ice Climber]]'' developed and published by [[wikipedia:Nintendo|Nintendo]].
* The Labu mouth earned from the {{Badge|Resourcefulness}} is a reference to [[wikipedia:Labubu|Labubu]] toys.
* There are two cosmetics in the game that are unobtainable through normal play, those being the eyes and spores cosmetics seen on [[Zombie|Zombies]].  The only way to obtain these cosmetics is to use [[mods]] to give them to yourself.
